select a1.* ,P.PICTURE ,(SELECT THUMBNAIL FROM CHALLENGE C2 WHERE C2.CHAL_NO = a1.CHAL_NO) ,(SELECT CC2.CATEGORY_NAME FROM CHALLENGE_CATEGORY CC2 WHERE CC2.CATEGORY_NO = a1.MAJOR_CATEGORY_NO ) AS CATEGORY_MAJOR_NAME from (select C.CHAL_NO ,C.USER_NO ,C.CATEGORY_NO ,C.TITLE ,C.CONTENT ,C.VERIFY_CYCLE ,C.CREATE_DATE ,C.START_DATE ,C.END_DATE ,C.STATUS ,C.PICTURE_REQUIRED ,C.REPLY_REQUIRED ,CC.CATEGORY_NAME ,(TRUNC(C.CATEGORY_NO / 10) * 10) AS MAJOR_CATEGORY_NO ,U.NICK ,P.BIO ,P.IS_OPEN ,COUNT(cp.user_no) as PARTICIPATE_COUNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN cp.STATUS = 'S' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as SUCCESS_COUNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN cp.STATUS = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as FAIL_COUNT ,CASE WHEN COUNT(cp.user_no) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND( SUM(CASE WHEN cp.STATUS = 'S' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(cp.user_no) , 2) END AS SUCCESS_RATIO ,CASE WHEN COUNT(cp.user_no) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND( SUM(CASE WHEN cp.STATUS = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(cp.user_no) , 2) END AS FAIL_RATIO
from CHALLENGE c left join CHALLENGE_CATEGORY cc on(c.CATEGORY_NO = cc.CATEGORY_NO) left join CHALLENGE_PARTICIPATION cp on(c.CHAL_NO = cp.CHAL_NO) left join USERS u on(c.USER_NO = u.USER_NO) left join PROFILE p on(c.USER_NO = p.USER_NO)
where c.CHAL_NO = #{chalNo} and c.STATUS != 'D'
group by C.CHAL_NO ,C.USER_NO ,C.CATEGORY_NO ,C.TITLE ,C.CONTENT ,C.VERIFY_CYCLE ,C.CREATE_DATE ,C.START_DATE ,C.END_DATE ,C.STATUS ,C.PICTURE_REQUIRED ,C.REPLY_REQUIRED ,CC.CATEGORY_NAME ,U.NICK ,P.BIO ,P.IS_OPEN ) a1 left join PROFILE P ON a1.USER_NO = P.USER_NO
select CHAL_NO ,USER_NO ,CATEGORY_NO ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,THUMBNAIL ,VERIFY_CYCLE ,START_DATE ,END_DATE ,STATUS ,PICTURE_REQUIRED ,REPLY_REQUIRED from CHALLENGE where CHAL_NO = #{chalNo} and status = 'Y'
